description.narrative: Leapfrog is a holding company formed to create, fund, and control businesses focused in the semiconductor systems and related software areas. Development Impact . Leapfrog is expected to provide a major push for India to enter the higher-end of the IT industry. As competition from lower-wage countries increases in the IT sector, India faces a significant challenge in moving up the curve into higher value-added products and services. Leapfrog is a notable initiative in this direction. The management team''s renown in the global semiconductor industry makes Leapfrog an exceptional opportunity to carry the Indian IT industry in a challenging new direction. In addition, Leapfrogs management team, niche strategy, off-shore/on-shore experience and networks, business processes, and independence, will provide an important demonstration effect for the broader technology investment industry in India. IFC Role . IFC participation in the project offers a number of benefits, including: Channeling support to leading-edge Indian technology companies in a difficult funding environment. Providing follow-on financing to meet growth needs of sub-investee companies. Giving additional comfort to Silicon-valley based investors bringing world-class relationships and expertise to the Indian market. Demonstration effect for high-technology investment in other IFC client countries.
